result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Angela Yvette Hudson

defendant.name: Hudson, Angela Yvette
defendant.address: 3932 W Silver Spring Drive, Milwaukee, WI 53209

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Angela Yvette Hudson appeared by video.  Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait appeared by video for Angela Yvette Hudson.  Prosecuting attorney Katrina Voge appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Hearing held via Zoom.  Pretrial conference held. Defendant needs to complete a course in anger management in order to reach resolution.  Case adjourned to Br. 1.
Status conference scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Angela Yvette Hudson appeared by video.  Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait appeared by video for Angela Yvette Hudson.  
Prosecuting attorney Katrina Voge appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
OFF THE RECORD.  Hearing held via Zoom.  Status conference held.  Defendant is trying to get an anger management class scheduled and counsel requests a status date. Case is adjourned to Br. 1. This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Angela Yvette Hudson in court with attorney Patrick Dennis Wait who appears by video means.  Katrina Voge appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for status conference.  Defense counsel recently appointed and is requesting adjourned status date to determine case posture. Case adjourned to Branch 1.
Hearing held via Zoom and live streamed through DA Cast.  Status conference scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Angela Yvette Hudson in court.  
Constatine Siapkaris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Status conference held.  Defendant still insists she cannot afford a PD.  Court informed the defendant that a payment plan can be arranged and ordered defendant to contact the public defender's office to work out a payment plan.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  Status conference scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant Angela Yvette Hudson in court.  
Brandon Schwebler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Matter set for pretrial conference.  Defendant qualifies for a public defender, but informed the Court she could not afford it.  Court ordered matter adjourned for status of counsel.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  Status conference scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Court ordered no possession or use of any dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with G.J.S.
No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Angela Yvette Hudson in court.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 01.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 01 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 2, 2022 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Angela Yvette Hudson
Current: 3932 W Silver Spring Drive, Milwaukee, WI 53209   (Effective: 05-13-2022)
Prior: 1525 North 24th Street #303, Milwaukee, WI 53205
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 05/13/2022@1:00pm
